title: based on the font on a sign in Manic Coffee
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071224115859im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/116_5435.jpg)

doodle doodle doodle.

College, near Bathurst in T.O. Great coffee & Strong too...
author: russellm

comments.content:
Gee, thanks. You got that from my coffee fueled doodling?? :¬)

I hate... and kind of like it.

-=®=-

I liked the ff ligature - and the “lone” f for that matter. That was what attracted me.  
-=®=-
